EmailTemplate.description: Upsell agreement to get YO 2.0 with no additional fees
EmailTemplate.name: Yodle Organic 2.0 UPSELL-NO FEES
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Organic Services - please "accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
This email confirms that Customer is adding the Yodle Organic Service to its Services, as set forth herein. As noted below, to accept the terms and conditions of this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
This Change Order changes the Agreement in effect between Yodle and Customer and becomes effective on the date accepted by Customer (the “Effective Date”).
The Yodle Organic Service. The Yodle Organic Service includes the application of “on page” and “off page” search engine optimization tactics designed to achieve a higher ranking for Customer’s website in search engine results and optimization for Customer's business listing in Google maps/places. To the extent its website is not hosted on Yodle’s servers, Customer will provide access to its website to enable Yodle to perform the Yodle Organic Service. Customer acknowledges that search results and search engine rankings are influenced by several factors, and Yodle does not guarantee any particular placement, position or rank for Customer’s website or business listing in any search results. In addition, the Yodle Organic Service includes Call Recording.
Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period. The minimum term of the Yodle Organic Service is {!Case.Term_months__c} months, commencing on the Effective Date (the “Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period”), and the term will continue month to month thereafter (and Customer will be billed the applicable monthly fees on a monthly recurring basis) until the Agreement is terminated or Customer cancels the Yodle Organic Service. Customer may not cancel the Yodle Organic Service during the Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period.
Monthly Fees. Customer agrees to pay the additional monthly fee for the Yodle Organic Service, which is {!Case.Budget__c} per month, effective as of the Effective Date.
Guarantee. If, for a key-phrase comprised of a geography and service relevant to your business, both (1) an Organic Page One Position and (2) a Paid Search Page One Position have not been attained within 90 days of the date you have completed all of the enrollment conditions, simply call us and you will receive a {!Case.Budget__c} credit for each subsequent month that you continue your combined Yodle Sponsored/Organic Combo Service until you have attained an Organic Page One Position and a Paid Search Page One Position. The enrollment conditions are [(i) if you have requested for us to redirect your existing domain to your new Adversite, you must provide the credentials necessary to complete the redirect] or (ii) if you have requested that we perform the Yodle Organic Service on your existing website, you must provide the credentials necessary for Yodle to access your website to perform the optimization work. “Organic Page One Position” means a link to Customer’s business has appeared on the front page in at least one of the following: Google organic, Google local, Yahoo organic, Yahoo local, Bing organic or Bing local. “Paid Search Page One Position" means one of Customer’s Ads has appeared on the front page in at least one of the following: Google search, Yahoo search or Bing search.
Welcome to Yodle.
Sincerely,
The Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
Date: {!Case.CreatedDate} Email: {!Case.SuppliedEmail} Client ID: {!Case.Client_ID__c} Yodle Representative: {!Case.Submitted_By__c}
{!Case.CaseNumber} Privacy Policy
Yodle Inc. Headquarters 50 West 23rd Street, 4th Floor, NY, NY 10010
